an3.127:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an3.127:4.2: Atha kho hatthako devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.127:4.4: “bhagavato purato ṭhassāmī”ti osīdatimeva saṃsīdatimeva, na sakkoti saṇṭhātuṃ.
an3.127:4.5: Seyyathāpi nāma sappi vā telaṃ vā vālukāya āsittaṃ osīdatimeva saṃsīdatimeva, na saṇṭhāti;
an3.127:4.7: “bhagavato purato ṭhassāmī”ti osīdatimeva saṃsīdatimeva, na sakkoti saṇṭhātuṃ.
an3.127:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā hatthakaṃ devaputtaṃ etadavoca:
an3.127:5.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti, kho hatthako devaputto bhagavato paṭissutvā oḷārikaṃ attabhāvaṃ abhinimminitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
an3.127:5.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho hatthakaṃ devaputtaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an3.127:6.1: “Ye te, hatthaka, dhammā pubbe manussabhūtassa pavattino ahesuṃ, api nu te te dhammā etarahi pavattino”ti?
an3.127:6.2: “Ye ca me, bhante, dhammā pubbe manussabhūtassa pavattino ahesuṃ, te ca me dhammā etarahi pavattino;
an3.127:6.3: ye ca me, bhante, dhammā pubbe manussabhūtassa nappavattino ahesuṃ, te ca me dhammā etarahi pavattino.
an3.127:6.4: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavā etarahi ākiṇṇo viharati bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi;
an3.127:6.5: evamevaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, ākiṇṇo viharāmi devaputtehi.
an3.127:6.6: Dūratopi, bhante, devaputtā āgacchanti hatthakassa devaputtassa santike ‘dhammaṃ sossāmā’ti.
an3.127:6.7: Tiṇṇāhaṃ, bhante, dhammānaṃ atitto appaṭivāno kālaṅkato.
an3.127:6.9: Bhagavato ahaṃ, bhante, dassanassa atitto appaṭivāno kālaṅkato;
an3.127:6.11: saṅghassāhaṃ, bhante, upaṭṭhānassa atitto appaṭivāno kālaṅkato.
an3.127:6.12: Imesaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ atitto appaṭivāno kālaṅkatoti.
an3.127:7.1: Nāhaṃ bhagavato dassanassa,
an3.127:7.2: Tittimajjhagā kudācanaṃ;
